							            Treatment Options by Stage
							            
							                    Stage 0 Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
							                    Treatment of stage 0 chronic lymphocytic leukemia is usually watchful waiting.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage 0 chronic lymphocytic leukemia. For more specific results, refine the
